item.title: Parking on pavement, 1st December
item.description:
Reported over a week ago. Vehicle still parked over pavement o Unity Road just before turning into Keswick Drive. No ticket or tow away in over a week!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 39, Unity Road, Greater London

item.title: Large amount of waste dumped on Regent's Canal, 1st December
item.description:
Large amount of fly tipped rubbish on the bank of Regent's Canal, under the corner of Baring St and New N Rd. In addition to being an eyesore, the rubbish often extends onto the path, making it a hazard for cyclists and pedestrians using the footpath.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): New North Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole several feet wide at the entrance to New Beckenham station, 1st December
item.description:
This pothole has been here for many months: twice before it has been reported via Fix My Street (7904159 & 7947184) and the Council keeps shirking its responsibility saying it is Network Rail's to fix, which it is not: I attach a Marlin Map of New Beckenham station showing clearly it is outside the station's lease.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pavilion Lane, New Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
